thread.title: cant beat the view
thread.title_full: cant beat the view - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: chennikita
title: cant beat the view
text:
The rooms are big ( Good) and need an update (not so good) especially the bathroom. However t the park view is magnificent . It totally elevates the score . I love to run in the park in the morning at its right outside. Hotel is next to the Ritz for less than half the price.
Room Tip: get a park view room See more room tips
